subject: [LH] Re: Love-Hounds Digest, Vol 53, Issue 4
body:
WHAT!!!!!???!!!!!
 
Kate might tour?!!!!
 
I would sell both kidneys to see that! Please - please! Keep us posted.... even if it's just someone's dentist's girlfriend who knows a hairdresser who overheard a conversation on a train kinda thing....

 
*sniffs smelling salts* 
On 6/5/07, love-hounds-request@gaffa.org <love-hounds-request@gaffa.org
> wrote:

200706041701.l54H1MY9014997@space.mit.edu>Donny Bravo <donnybravo@jesusanswers.com> wrote:> Alison Goldfrapp is a frighteningly ugly crossdresser, right?
Yeah, well I'm sure there are some photos of you too where you look likea frighteningly ugly crossdresser.I saw her live a few years ago and she was pretty and sang incrediblywell.|>oug
------------------------------Message: 3Date: Mon, 4 Jun 2007 18:04:52 -0400From: "Richard Messum" <spriggsoc@cyg.net>Subject: [LH] Kate to tour?
To: love-hounds@gaffa.orgMessage-ID: <000201c7a754$5a1ab660$4001a8c0@Mutch>Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed; charset="iso-8859-1";       reply-type=original
The following was posted to my Fairport Convention List (and i'm forwardingit here with the permission of the writer).  Does anyone know any more?"A FOF*, who's a FOF, who's a FOF, who's a...oh, you get the idea, who
workedwith the lovely Ms Bush a while back and still keeps in contact with "thecamp",  has passed on the info. that, after 28 years since the last tour,(apartfrom the VERY occasional live appearance), Kate is planning a very limited
number of live appearances later this year / early 2008."*Friend of a friend"Richard------------------------------_______________________________________________Love-Hounds mailing list
Love-Hounds@gaffa.orghttp://gaffa.org/mailman/listinfo/love-houndsEnd of Love-Hounds Digest, Vol 53, Issue 4
